resource_notes: Requires deep understanding of Vercel serverless timeout limits and recursive fetch patterns
alternative_approach: Use long-running container (AWS Fargate) if serverless proves unstable
risk_factors: Debugging async job chains is time-intensive; Potential for infinite loops
mitigation_strategy: Pair programming during initial skeleton setup; implement strict depth limits

resource_notes: Security critical task; Must implement strict tenant isolation logic
alternative_approach: None - middleware is essential for Next.js security
risk_factors: Performance impact on edge functions; Improper regex matching
mitigation_strategy: Dedicated security review phase; Load testing middleware latency

resource_notes: Can be parallelized; Frontend dev should mock data API initially
alternative_approach: Wait for real API (blocks frontend progress)
risk_factors: Data shape mismatch between mock and real API
mitigation_strategy: Define shared TypeScript interfaces (Zod schemas) before implementation
